## Open-source pH sensor

I am currently developing a low-cost, high-frequency, open-source intertidal pH sensor.

The Github repository for this project can be found <a href="https://github.com/ameliaritger/ph-sensor-dev" target="_blank">here</a>. Stay tuned for updates!
